title: "Query parallelization helps to boost Power BI dataset performance in DirectQuery mode"
excerpt: "We are excited to announce significant query processing improvements in the Power BI engine around query parallelization in DirectQuery mode, which can help to accelerate query response times, specifically for DAX and MDX expressions that generate multiple storage engine (SE) queries. "
